function isValidUrl(url) {

var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);

if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

Product Description

You can choose from a variety of colors

There are so many colors, and you can choose one which you like best.

The Soft Seat Belt Shoulder Pads are not just simple and fashion trend but also fully functional and practical in many purposes.

These are not just intend to your car seatbelt, these are also applicable in your sling bag, pack bag, guitar bag sling, golf bag sling, arm chairs and the likes.

This soft seat belt shoulder pad will provide you the most convenient driving experience ever. This is made of high quality , soft and smooth, comfortable feel, It’s not easy to fade, and healthy.

Color: As the picture show

Package included: 2 Pcs Car Seatbelt Shoulder Pad

With the high quality material, the seatbelt pads covers are very soft and warm; making it has the right amount of padding without being too bulky. This adds comfort and makes your driving more relaxing.

It is the best gift for your relatives and friends.

Gives Comfort and Helps Relieve Friction

Soft material

The car seat belt shoulder pads are made of soft materials.

Soft and Comfortable

The high quality seat belt pads are super soft and fit great to the seatbelt, provide lots of comfort.

Easy to Apply with Strong Cloth Sticker

Our shoulder pads are very easy to apply by just a cloth sticker along the length, the sticker is very strong and fits together very snugly and does not snag your clothes, easy stick on and off.

Seat Belt Pads Stay in Place

Velcro holds them in place, they don’t slide down, doesn’t move up & down while you are driving.

Multi-Purpose

The Soft Seat Belt Shoulder Pads are not just simple and fashion trend but also fully functional and practical in many purposes.

These are not just intend to your car seatbelt, also applicable in your sling bag, pack bag, guitar bag sling, golf bag sling, arm chairs and the likes.

Package Content: 2x 1 Pair seat belt shoulder pads
These Shoulder Seatbelt Cushions are great for protecting you while you drive.
It easily installs on all shoulder seatbelts, Each seat belt cover has a piece of durable special cloth sticker on the underside that you simply open, fold over the seat belt and then close again.
This Seat belt pad can be used for car, trunk, jeep, SUV, airplane, can also be used on your handbag, baby diaper bag, golf bag, luggage which has a strap, and anyplace else you want padded comfort.
This gives relaxation with its soft and comfortable feel; this makes your driving experience more at ease. This also encourages the kids to wear their seatbelts.

item.title: The Office BFFs: Tales of The Office from Two Best Friends Who Were There
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) INSTANT #1 NEW YORK TIMES BESTSELLER An intimate, behind-the-scenes, richly illustrated celebration of beloved The Office co-stars Jenna Fischer and Angela Kinsey‚Äôs friendship, and an insiders’ view of Pam Beesly, Angela Martin, and the iconic TV show. Featuring many of their never-before-seen photos. Receptionist Pam Beesly and accountant Angela Martin ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $12.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:35:23 UTC – Details)

INSTANT #1 NEW YORK TIMES BESTSELLER

An intimate, behind-the-scenes, richly illustrated celebration of beloved The Office co-stars Jenna Fischer and Angela Kinsey‚Äôs friendship, and an insiders’ view of Pam Beesly, Angela Martin, and the iconic TV show. Featuring many of their never-before-seen photos.

Receptionist Pam Beesly and accountant Angela Martin had very little in common when they toiled together at Scranton‚Äôs Dunder Mifflin Paper Company. But, in reality, the two bonded in their very first days on set and, over the nine seasons of the series‚Äô run, built a friendship that transcended the show and continues to this day. Sharing everything from what it was like in the early days as the show struggled to gain traction, to walking their first red carpet‚Äîplus exclusive stories on the making of milestone episodes and how their lives changed when they became moms‚ÄîThe Office BFFs is full of the same warm and friendly tone Jenna and Angela have brought to their Office Ladies podcast.

Long-Lasting Feeding: The 5L/21 Cups food storage will keep most pets comfortably fed for several weeks. The double bowl food dispenser is a perfect solution to feed 2 cats at same time and and won’ t have any fights.
Voice Record Meal Call: The auto feeder allows you to record a 10s short voice message when it‚Äôs mealtime to create a strong bond and makes your pets fed regularly, feeling safe with well cared even when you‚Äôre absent. Due to the setting lock of the LCD screen, pets can‚Äôt play with or mess up programming.
Dual Power Protection: The pet food dispenser works with a 5V DC adapter, also stores three D-size batteries (NOT included) as a backup power supply. Unplanned power outages won’t interrupt the your feeder’s programming and deprive your furry friend of dinner. Giving you more holiday flexibility.
Safe and Reliable Feeder: A desiccant bag and the secure lock lid not only keeps the food fresh but also prevents your pet from accessing stored food. The detachable design allows a thorough cleaning to reduce bacterial growth, makes your life easier and pets healthier.

From the brand

Vimtag is a company that wants to preserve the micro-warm moments in every home, keeping safety close to everyone, focusing on it at all times and taking danger into your own hands. With the smart home security camera, you can get functions of real-time viewing, remote caring, real-time intercom, video storage, etc. They are suitable for the security of homes, shops and office, and the caring of the elderly, children, and pets.

Pet/Dog Camera

Indoor Security Camera

Vimtag Mini G3

„ÄêFull 1080P HD and 355¬∞ Pan/Tilt„Äë: The Vimtag pet camera provides 8X optical zoom, 1080P HD crystal clear smooth live video with 355¬∞ horizontal and 100¬∞ vertical rotation range, covering every corner of your home,monitor your pets, baby all the time . Dog Camera works with 2.4G WiFi.
„ÄêSmart Motion Detection Alarm„Äë: This indoor pet camera with phone app supports motion, human and sound detection, when motion or sound is detected, the app will send you a notification, just open it to check quickly what is going on, you will not miss any important movements of your pets.You can watch your baby via your phone wherever you are.
„ÄêTwo-way Audio & Works with Alexa„Äë: The pet cam built-in microphone & speaker, allowing you to keep in touch with your baby while you are out. Works with Alexa, ask Alexa to show your the doorway, living room, or anywhere else you have this dog camera.
„Äê24/7 Record Absolute Protection for Your Family„Äë: This indoor wifi camera for home security,features in IR-CUT function to capture real-time crisp videos and photos from day to night, advanced night vision with IR distance up to 32 ft, home camera also lets you can keep an eye on your home anytime anywhere.
„ÄêOptional Cloud & Local SD Storage„Äë: Financial encryption video storage technology enables the security camera to keep a private recording in the Vimtag cloud, meanwhile you can choose an SD card (up to 128G) to avoid any possible risks, managing 24/7 absolute protection for your family,baby and pets.


Keep an Eye on Your Love & Home Anytime Anywhere, Always be There.

What’s included:

  • 1x Smart Home Camera
  • 1x USB Adapter
  • 1x Quick Installation Guide
  • 1x Cable
  • Mounting Accessories (Bracket, Screws)

Vimtag Pet Camera C22

The Vimtag indoor pet camera can be easily installed, connect the camera with 2.4G WiFi , you could place it on the table or hang on the wall, then enjoy smooth superb live stream footage directly on your smartphone via our app (iOS, Android) anytime anywhere.

Your privacy is our top priority.

  • 355¬∞x100¬∞ Coverage with 1080P FHD Resolution
  • Real-time Monitoring & Night Vision
  • Two-way Audio & Works with Alexa
  • Smart Motion Detection Alarm
  • Optional Cloud & Local SD Storage
  • 24/7 Record Absolute Protection for Your Pets or Baby.

Read more

1080P and 8X Optical Zoom

The Wifi camera features 1080P, providing you a clear image and videos. The 8X optical zoom enable you capture clear image while zoom in and out.

Motion and Sound Detection

The baby camera with phone app supports motion, sound and human detection. You will get instant alerts from the app when motion, baby cries or unusual sounds are detected.

Two-way Aduio

Baby monitor adopts anti noise technology, built-in microphone and speaker allow you talk with you family,baby or pet whenever you want.

Read more

SD Card & Cloud Storage with 2.4G WiFi

Supports Micro SD card storage up to 128 GB (SD card not included). And using Cloud Storage can avoid the risk of losing footage from SD card. Home Camera works with 2.4G WiFi.

Works with Alexa

The puppy camera is compatible with Alexa, controlling baby camera hands-free with your voice, you could ask Alexa to show you the doorway.

Clear Night Vision

Security camera,Night Vision with a night vision up to 32 ft, auto-switching to night mode when the light is dimmed, helping you see up to 32 feet at night.

Read more

More Questions you might care about?

1. Why can’t I connect the camera with my phone?

  1. Please confirm the WiFi name and password (no spaces).
  2. Please confirm your phone connect the WiFi is 2.4G when configure the cam,after that there is no restriction .
  3. Please check if the camera and mobile are close to your router, or if the camera and the mobile connect the same WiFi.
  4. Please reset the camera for 10 seconds or longer to restore to factory settings, you need to configure connecting again. Or try scan the QR code to add the camera.

2. How to share the camera with my family?

  1. First let your family sign up for a new account, pay attention to register with a new email account.
  2. Go to settings, choose “Device Sharing”, then enter the device password, click to generate the QR code.
  3. The person who you are sharing this with will open the app, select the device type, and scan the QR code.

3. Why my device does not recognize the SD card?

  1. Support up to128GB Micro SD Card;
  2. It is recommended to check the SD card for damage before using. The format must be FAT2 or EXFAT32.
  3. NOTE: Please insert/remove the SD card after cutting off camera’s power. Otherwise, the SD card can’t be read.

Technical Details

Connectivity Protocol WiFi
Controller Type APP Control on Phone/PC/Tablet
Video Capture Resolution 1080P HD
Night Vision Range Up to 32ft
